caption: Respond to a property possession claim
heading: {{claimantName, pluralPossessive}} claim
secondaryHeading: Respond to a property possession claim
paragraph1: When they made their claim, {{claimantName}} had to give information about:
listItem1: the tenancy, occupation contract or licence agreement
listItem2: the notice of their intention to begin possession proceedings, if they served you with one
listItem3: their grounds for possession (their reasons for making the claim)
paragraph2: If any of the information is wrong, or you disagree with it, you can dispute their claim or parts of it.
paragraph3: The claimant will be able to see your answers.
